website_summaries.verdict: Buyers looking for a non-traditional wallet case will find their match in this no-nonsense product.
pros: Bulk-free design offers a slim case while still holding three credit cards and cash
Includes protective film covering for glass screen
Works with wireless charging, unlike most other wallet cases
cons: Slippery material can be difficult to hold

customer_reviews.title: This case saved my leg.
customer_reviews.text: I was clearing some brush in the woods and I went to put down the chainsaw and it brushed against my leg, luckily my cell phone and this case were in my pocket, exactly where the chainsaw touched. It prevented a trip to the hospital, and my phone had no damage. Needless to say I bought another one. It also holds my ID and cards as an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the protection with this case
customer_reviews.text: I had this case for 2 days and took it on a trip to Puerto Rico and dropped my phone while taking a picture. The phone slipped out of my hand as I pulled it from my pocket and fell about 3 1/2 feet to the concrete ground. It hit in the corner just to the left of the camera and shattered the glass on the rear. The description for the case states that the corners profide cushion to absorb impact. Did not work in this case. Realize this case does not do much to protect a phone from drops.
customer_reviews.author: David & Parvati

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and convenient, but NOT protective at all!
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this case. It’s so convenient, no need for a wallet/purse/wristlet!! However, one week in and I’ve cracked my screen twice! I even used the screen protector included (which is keeping everything together I guess). The flaw in the design of the case is the lip is too thin, and although the case doesn’t add bulk to ur phone, u lose essential protection. And I would also like to add that my previous case was one I got from apple, and although I always dropped my phone I had NOT even a scratch on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Case on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best cases I’ve ever bought. I’ve owned about 4 of these cases over the last 6 years and I absolutely love them. Super lightweight, very durable, and the card hold works amazing. I can fit about 4 credit cards for a good fit, 5 is doable but not recommended because it could potentially stretch the case over a long period of having that many cards. Amazing case though, highly recommend! HOWEVER, Do not rely on the protective case it comes with. It’s super cheap and flimsy, get yourself a better tempered glass one that’s at least .3 thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Hoarder

customer_reviews.title: Holds 3 cards securely.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new phone and decided to treat myself to a new case as well. I have used this exact case before, but the new phone clashed with the old case. I looked at all the other cases on the market and couldn ̈t find one that looked like it would meet my needs as well. I carry my DL, Costo, and Visa cards in it. There has never been a time when I was afraid that I would lose a card. Cards are very easy to insert and remove. I don ̈t need a wallet- just my phone with this card case. Also makes phone easier to hold with less risk of dropping it. Don hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: CRZYWMN

customer_reviews.title: All the essentials
customer_reviews.text: I love not carrying a purse to hold all the stuff women tend to carry. My phone and cards are all in one spot. Although I can’t carry all cards, I just pack the essentials. I insert my state I’d, credit card, health insurance card and auto insurance card. My insurance card is a piece of paper so I can easily add this in by folding it and it doesn’t and hasn’t fallen out. Like all the cards I want to pull out, I have to nudge them out with the thumb slot to reveal the tops of the cards. It’s easy to grip and easy to disinfect along with my cards after being out in the world. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks in and my phone is ruined.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a brand new iPhone 8 plus and put this case, along with the screen protector, the first time I dropped my phone with this case on it the screen cracked along with the LCD underneath it. Now its going to cost me 225$ to replace the phone. Do not buy this phone case. The price is good but not when it's going to cost you a new phone. I can't even use the phone because the touch screen is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: fantastic, well made phone case
customer_reviews.text: i always buy the phone cases with the attached credit card slots. i have an older one that i used for my iphone 6. just upgraded to iphone se which is the same size as the old iphone 6. wanted a new, more stylish case. i used the custom option and got the floral case with the black background. the case is sturdy, well made and i can easily fit my drivers license and two credit cards. love this case!
customer_reviews.author: kandylandmo

customer_reviews.title: Functional, not the most complete protection, but it ticks allot of boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Like it, don't love it. It would get better eating if it came clean. Edges all look dirty even after cleaning. Pros A magnetic mount works through it. Cards stay secure Popsocket works with magnetic mount and cards. Cons Can't get edges clean regardless of what I've tried Caerful how you put cards in it, the gripping mechanisms scratches. Simple fix just flip or reverse to protect sensitive aspects better. After about 9 months of continuous use the grip mechanism is just starting to lose its effectiveness slightly. Not enough I'm thinking it will lose the cards, but enough with the dirty edges aspect I'm looking for a replacement. It's too bad since this ticked allot of boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K.

customer_reviews.title: Great case for iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: I love phone cases that have room for cards as it's so much easier to carry around than a thick wallet and a card and keys and who knows what else. This case is great and allows for more cards than my previous phone's case, which I also loved for similar features. I've got 5 cards and they go in and come out smoothly. They don't fall out and they don't get stuck. Does the job!! I wish I had waited for the next iPhone but my previous phone was breaking, so I went ahead and got the 7. That being said, when the next iPhone comes out, if this case works in size, I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Milla Pen

customer_reviews.title: ...Probably Wont Protect My Screen From Drops
customer_reviews.text: I want to like it but it’s definitely not built for clumsy people. The two stars are for beautiful graphic design and the wallet concept overall but this thing is going back. While the “flavor of the month” decal offers some grip ability the main cover material is stiff and doesn’t have much grip, especially around the outer edges. The case itself sits flush along the edges of the screen but I don’t think that there is enough case bumping off the front of the screen to provide sufficient drop protection. The main point of having a case in the first place is to protect it from drops so it seems to be a fail to start in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love me a card case.
customer_reviews.text: I really love Silk's Wallet Slayer case. I had a black one for my iPhone 6 and purchased a purple one for my iPhone 8. The price is super reasonable and held up very well that I eventually stopped carrying purses. My only complaint is that with the purple one, it held black stains pretty visibly (it was a dark color too). I don't know if the previous models did the same, but that's my only request for improvement in the future.
customer_reviews.author: kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet case
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty rough on cases and thought there was no way this case would hold a card and an ID & not slip out. I was wrong. After numerous drops, it’s not only protected my phone but also my cards have barely slipped out. They actually stay put even though it doesn’t feel like they should upon first inspection. I’ve had spigen wallet cases & this one has lasted longer (presumably bc the plastic used is much softer/ not brittle). I have put 2 bills, 2 cards & an ID in the slot at once & although I wouldn’t recommend that for regular use, it was good for a night out or a longer shopping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Mia bogert

customer_reviews.title: A great buy, no regrets.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very surprised and happy with this case. I like it very much lol. It feels great and durable while holding 3 cards which I was looking for, very happy since it’s hard to find a good case that isn’t overly expensive. The packaging was spot on and seems fitting for the company too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present for my husbands birthday (this is his 3rd silk card holder phone case, he loves this style phone case, we get him a new one every year for his birthday, not because it is coming apart or not holding cards anymore, but because it’s starts looking dirty which for a years worth of use we think is great usage!!! He loves this particular phone case and I’m sure it will be on his birthday list next year, and we love that they now have designs on the cases. Great phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I have used this phone case for about 3 months now and I felt the case has stood the test. I have dropped my phone multiple times and the case has protected my phone and screen (no cracks). I really like the wallet feature of this phone case, it’s a very sleek design. The advertising for this phone case states you can fit 3 cards in the back slot but I am able to fit 4 cards in. I even was able to stash some case along with my 4 cards by wrapping my cash around one of the cards. I felt this phone case is excellent value for the price, they even sent a screen protector with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had this case on my phone for over 3 years now
customer_reviews.text: I have been going through my Amazon purchases to write reviews and I couldn't pass writing one for this awesome case! I have dropped my phone plenty of times, like anyone can and will, and my phone is still in perfect condition. This case is perfect for me because I do not like carrying a purse into places I go. My license, debit card, credit card, and Sam's club card are always at my fingers. This case is a STEAL for the cost. Wonderful quality and sturdiness...as mentioned in the title, I bought this case over 3 years ago and still have it on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bowman

customer_reviews.title: WHERE HAS THIS BEEN ALL MY LIFE?
customer_reviews.text: It will hold 3-4 cards, I laminated my car insurance card. I carry my license, debit card, 1 CC & my SF ins card! It’s the BEST! I’’ll be upgrading my phone soon, I hope it’s abailable I’m more sizes. I do find it a lil difficult to clean, but I think I just haven’t found the right cleaner yet. I prefer the brighter colors, because it’s easier to find your phone, around the house or in the bottom of your purse. But wouldn’t keep me from buying it again!!! It’s also very protective. It will charge on the flat charger, if I remove the cards... I like that!
customer_reviews.author: DMB93

customer_reviews.title: Only one thing in my pocket!
customer_reviews.text: When I go out I only need 3 things: my phone, my debit card and my driver's license. This wallet case allows that without a separate carrying case for the DC and DL! It holds the cards securely, sometimes a little too securely, but I would rather that then the cards dropping out. Another plus is that if I ever lose my phone there is ID in it some someone can contact me if found (or send a thank you card if they steal it! :p ) I cant really speak to it's durability. Though I have had it for a few months now and it is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: TK McGuinness

customer_reviews.title: Not the Type of Case I Usually Get
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent temporary case until I can one with better styling and durability. I bought it on the fly to get quick protection for my iPhone SE 2020. It fits snug and it has the added benefit of being able to hold a few ID cards/credit cards in a flap on the back. For the price I can always keep it as a backup when I get my "forever" case. I found it difficult to remove the case from the phone but I find that to be a good thing. The tighter the case grip I feel the better it will protect my phone.
customer_reviews.author: A Bronx Tale

customer_reviews.title: Great look & convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this looks. I had a different wallet case before that was way bulkier. I love how slim this is. The design is great. My cards are easy to get to, but do not feel like they’ll fall out on their own. Feels like a pretty durable case too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Parks

customer_reviews.title: Volume button problems
customer_reviews.text: The volume on my phone constantly gets turned down when I use this case. I think the covers for the volume buttons stick out a little too far and they keep getting pressed when the phone is in my pocket. I've had to disable the ability to change the ringer volume with the buttons, or else I would never be able to hear my ringer. Other than that, the case is working out okay. The cards stay in the case (maybe a little looser than I would like) and it seems to protect my phone fairly well. But the volume problem is very frustrating and prevents me from giving this a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: brandy3392

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone case/card holder especially for the price. I was worried the cards might slide out or move around inside the slip, but they stay still and can only be removed upon physically taking them out. I keep my train card, license, and two debit cards and could probably fit some cash or another card if need be. The protection of the phone itself is also good; it's rubbery enough to absorb shock if dropped and wont throw your cards all over the place. Definitely use the glass screen protector provided with the purchase (if you don't already have one) Overall, I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: so useful
customer_reviews.text: wallet and phone now easily combined. not the cutest but perfect access to credit cards. i love that you can push the side to see the cards before choosing one to pull out. sometimes you do have to take multiple cards out to get to one in the middle, though. Also you need at least three cards in there (or add some cash) for them to stay secure and not fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Three cards or some cash
customer_reviews.text: It does as told and is super protective. My only issue was that when I did eventually have to put cash into my wallet I found that it can hold three cards or some cash, meaning I would have to remove two of my cards to fix three folded bills. Otherwise it’s a great product and I really recommend it
customer_reviews.author: HarleyReadIt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: The case is actually pretty good. The sides are grippier than the last model and the internal cardholder can, for me, hold 4 cards with ease. The rubber is high quality and the sides are thick and durable. The case is very slim in your pocket and the cards, even with deliberate shaking, do not fall out. However, it's not great at side protection. I dropped my phone in the case from 3 feet onto hardwoods and the corner of my screen has a crack, but I think it's because of the wonky angle my phone landed on. Overall, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: The worst case I have ever bought. It bows in the middle. My pop sockets won't stick. New ones or old ones. I definitely should have gone elsewhere. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ogden

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: Had a wallet-back phone case for about a year and a half now, they’re super helpful when you forget things easily or just don’t like to carry a lot at once and your phone becomes both a phone and your wallet. Ordered this one a bit hesitantly because of the price (and because I was afraid my card wouldn’t stay in it) but I eventually caved and ordered the custom print black & Atari party. The past few days, its kept my card, license, and student ID in without feeling super bulky like the other cases I’ve had, no instances of anything falling out and it looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this case for about two years now and just got another for my husband. It looks as good as the day I got it. I’ve dropped my phone several times and never had any issues. I love being able to hold my cards. For the money this case can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is the best wallet option out there for iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wallet option out there for iPhone 8, especially considering the very reasonable price. The edge protection is reasonable good - probably a couple millimeters above the glass surface. I'd give it 5 stars if it was just a little higher, giving me more of a comfort level. However, a couple drops so far and it seems to protect it just fine. Fits 3 cards well, can do 4 or a bill or 2 in a pinch. The slot on the left makes it easy to retrieve the cards. The case is light and easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Weston Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Good card holder case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case! I was a little skeptical that the cards would stay put but I’ve been using it for about two weeks and they haven’t slipped out once. Also feels really good in my hand. The material is a pliable rubbery plastic so doesn’t seem like it would offer a ton of protection if you are prone to dropping your phone, but the functionality of the card holder is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jones

customer_reviews.title: iPhone SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: I have the IPhone SE 2020. I like the card holder however I found it very hard to get money out when I have one card in and I recommend getting a pop socket. Other than that though I had this case for a couple months and dropped my phones multiple times and no scratches or dents on the phone anywhere. Get a screensaver though that’s a no brainer. Overall I really recommend this case
customer_reviews.author: mr duckliing

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Not being a purse or pocketbook person, I rely on a good solid phone cover-wallet. So far I like this one. It’s durable. Very gripable. The wallet is subtle and as such does not attract anyone’s eye to my cards. Only challenge I’ve had thus far is the wallet is tight and I have to take everything out to get my card/ID etc. However, I keep business cards with me and store them alone with my other wallet stuff (credit card, license). That might make it a wee bit too tight. All in all, if you’re on the fence, perhaps worried about your stuff falling out or being easily visibale, don’t be. This is a sound purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tryshah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Silk Smart
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Silk/Smartish phone case. Absolutely love the case. It's a simple design and holds 4 credit cards easily and they have never slipped out over the 4 years I had my original. Opted for a different color this time around. Great , fun company that gives back thru their programs. Only wish I had gone to their website instead of Amazon as I found a lot more choices on the site. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Foster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone case!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this exact same case any time I get a new phone. I love that it holds my cards so I don't have to carry a wallet. You can also use the slots in the back to hold your phone, similar to a pop socket. I have also dropped my phone more times than I can count and have never had the screen crack or any other physical damage occur to my phone. I have an iPhone 8+ now but have used the case on my old iPhone 5 and 6+ as well, and would happily purchase a new case for any other phone I get in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet case! Use w pop socket!
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone case! It’s very thick and durable! It holds a lot of cards! (5?) and you could still use RFID for train pass or entry or whatever. Very good quality! I also like that it’s plastic so I can still use a pop socket with it. Has a little thumb area so you can poke cards out and not ruin your nails/spending 5 minutes trying to get card at cashier. It the best wallet case I’ve seen or used! Just a little thick/bulky
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Murdock

customer_reviews.title: I have gotten used to not carrying a wallet around and I needed to be able to hold 3 cards not just 2 like most other cases
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by this. Not really a fan of the look, but not going to risk another leather case with card holders I decided to try this one before giving up. I have gotten used to not carrying a wallet around and I needed to be able to hold 3 cards not just 2 like most other cases. I wish I could go with out protection, but since I really should have a case, and I hate having my pockets filled with stuff, this really works well. Slides in and out of pants with easy, and never feels slippery. Good wallet case.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal_C

customer_reviews.title: Must have case!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second phone I’ve bought a case this style for and I won’t go back. It’s sleek, low profile, simple and incredibly useful. My wife likes to carry like 6 cards so she uses super bulky cases. I’m a minimalist. Credit Card, driver’s license, and 1 business card jic. Lately, I’ve run into a few situations where I needed cash so I simply folder a $20 in half around one of my cards. I also drop my phone a lot and the case serves its other purpose as well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Holds cards well, phone WILL slip out of your hands often
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good wallet case, but the description and even the pictures stated that it had good grip. The case feels the same all over. The sides are textured from the same material but still provides NO GRIP. You’ll still need to buy a pop socket or ring or something because the case WILL make your phone slide out your hand often even if your hands are dry, moisturized, sticky, thick or thin, it’ll slip right out your hand
customer_reviews.author: Stef D

customer_reviews.title: I ran my phone over and it survived!
customer_reviews.text: This case has been great! I also got a universal mount to stick on the back of it so I can mount it in my car and this case supports that perfectly. I actually left my phone on my SUV tire, backed up and ran it over. I had this case plus a screen protector and my phone was fine! Thank god! I swapped the screen protector and I’m good to go! The case it still perfect after that!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this case!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had the last version of this same Silk wallet case on his iPhone 6 Plus for three years, so when he recently upgraded to an iPhone 8 Plus, he purchased this one to fit the new phone. The price is great! It is a very well made case and all cut-outs align perfectly. He keeps his business cards in the slot so they are always handy, and says people often complement it. It does provide some level of protection, too, as he has dropped his phone onto the driveway getting out of the car and the phone was fine. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Love this so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few days and it has admirably solved my problem of nearly always forgetting my wallet. I keep my id, a credit card, and a $20 bill in the pocket. It is totally secure. The case is definitely bulkier than my last one, which was really just a skin, but I like it because I always have my phone in my back pocket, and because it is bulkier I can feel it and am reminded to take it out of my pocket before sitting down. All my previous drops were from forgetting I had the phone in my pocket and then it falling on the floor when I went to sit down.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd case like this that I have bought for various iPhones. I love them so much I probably will never get another brand. It comfortably holds up to 4 cards (5 if some are thin). It fits perfectly with no gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: The long edges are getting a little loose after taking the phone out a few timesI had a Speck card holder case previously for my iphone 5 and really liked it and it has held up for almost 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: fits the iphone 8 well and fits four cards (2 credit cards, 1 drivers license and costco card) as promised. It also makes the power button less apt to turn on with such little pressure than if it had no case. The long edges are getting a little loose after taking the phone out a few timesI had a Speck card holder case previously for my iphone 5 and really liked it and it has held up for almost 4 years without fail and this brand/product seem similar and I hope it will last/perform equally well.
customer_reviews.author: Baummer

customer_reviews.title: Secure case
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I had one of those cases that opens up and has three or four slots for credit cards on the inside. The problem with that is that it got stretched out and I lost some credit cards. I really like to carry my license and one other card with me at all times. This case is the perfect solution. Those two items fit very snuggly inside. There is no way they are falling out. They are also very easy to take out when you need them. I am really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: ELF

customer_reviews.title: still slim, good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm really happy with this phone case! It fits snugly, and the cards feel like they're held in well and safely. Buttons all line up just right. I added a stick on ring to the back (adhesive like a pop socket) and its holding well, unlike a silicone case. It's still slim enough to fit in my pocket too. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Easy, convenient, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This case is very easy to hold, install and remove. It holds three cards well as advertised. Strong signal for both WiFi and cellular tower... my last case showed discoloring and hard to remove, not the case here! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: General

customer_reviews.title: Solid wallet case
customer_reviews.text: I used to only use folio cases because I liked being able to cover my phone, carry cards, and have a kickstand. I thought I wouldn't be able to get used to this case type, but the case has been really great! It carries and holds credit cards cards and my iPhone 8 can be wirelessly charged through the case with and without cards. The bottom half of the phone is textured for easier gripping. You can tell they thought of the small details when making this case. It's a great and simple case that works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S

customer_reviews.title: Bought another SILK case for my new iPhone 6+
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this same case but for my iPhone 5 because I liked that it had a built- in wallet. I used both the case and iPhone 5 for at least 3 years and loved the case from the beginning until the end! Also, I liked I was able to fit a good amount of money and cards in the wallet. When I got a new iPhone, I bought the same case since I liked it so much! It was still a great case and I was still able to fit a lot of money and cards in it. I highly recommend buying a case from this company, known as SILK.
customer_reviews.author: Niko M.

customer_reviews.title: So simple yet so good
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this phone case. She holds 2 cards and a few notes in it all the time and doesn't need her bag with her. The simple thing that makes it so good is that there is a space for your finger to push the cards out really conveniently when at the shops etc. As a phone case it's an excellent fit for her iphone 7+ and provides as good protection as most provided you have your own screen guard. Would highly recommend if you want a case with a card holder.
customer_reviews.author: Mono

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have a prime account but even though it was expected around the week days it came a day earlier on Sunday. I was super stoked to open the package. It’s very plain and simple so I might have to make it more girly and customize it. It customizable option was really just too expensive. Other than that I think that this is a great case. Perfect for my iPhone 8 and carrying around cards. I currently only have 1 debit card. But it still holds great and I can just feel that the material is sure to protect my iPhone from any mishaps.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of carrying a large wallet when I only needed a few cards and some cash. This easily hold my license and two bank cards. It could hold a 4th card, but it may bulge too much for your liking and make it a little harder to retrieve the cards. The images show putting cash in the slot too, but it’s not practical. It will however, hold 2-4 bills folded in half between the phone and case without having to worry about the case coming off during regular use. Just enough room to keep some cash if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: JDE

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great 'hand'!
customer_reviews.text: The case fits my iPhone 8 very well and has just the right amount of grip to help avoid the slippages I had with my old case. It is also just a wee bit more slender (particularly at the ends) and just a skosh narrower, making it possible for me to hold the phone and take a photo in one hand. I love the color, it has a nice brightness to the blue. The case on the back snugly holds my 2 credit cards and drivers license. Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Redbud

customer_reviews.title: MY SECOND PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a grey one and it got dirty over time so I decided to get a black one this time. I can't live without a phone case that can hold my cards it's so much easier to take out my id/credit card/tpass! I fit 3 cards in with ease. It may seem like it would fall out but it doesn't! Yet it also is very easy to take out because of the design where I can push it out. I may even consider the customize feature in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: Second one I’ve purchased. I get a lot of compliments on easy design. Works well as small wallet (3 cards fit comfortably). You can place a bill between two cards to carry cash, or store one under case between phone and case for emergencies with relative ease, but don’t try to use for folding cash without card. I use with a pop socket and glass screen protector. I drop it a couple times a day without a problem. The glass screen protector cracks every now and then but my phone itself is safe. I have used this case for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Holds 1 Debit Card and 3 ID Cards Very Securely.  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case! I keep 1 debit card (with raised numbers) and 3 ID cards (with no raised numbers) and they fit just fine. Everything is extremely secure. The only time it might feel a little loose if if you are carrying only one card. It still holds one card good, but it could possibly come out if you bump it just right, but you would probably have to bump it several times. As long as you have at least two cards they are not going anywhere! I love this case! All I need are my phone and my keys and I can go anywhere without my purse! Love the freedom! Love this case!
customer_reviews.author: Cool Tech Chick

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover and excellent card holder
customer_reviews.text: My old phone cover was wearing and I had an adhesive pocket on the back to hold my driver's license and a credit card. This case does just that without the bulkiness of the add-on pocket. It has a nice grip on the sides and it fits my iphone 8 perfectly. It is like having a brand new phone!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Zero grip or phone screen protection. Absolutely useless case.
customer_reviews.text: All I wanted was a durable case that could hold a few credit cards. When I received this case last month, I realized immediately that it was extremely slippery and has absolutely no grip. I figured it wasn’t a big deal because I rarely drop my phone and the case would protect it anyway. While trying to put my credit card back in the sleeve after a purchase, the phone slipped out of my hands landing on a flat concrete floor and the entire iPhone screen I’m typing on write now is destroyed. Please put grip on this case and I would love if someone from this company contacted me about a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Survived infant-toddler stages
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new phone while pregnant with my now 4yo. Not only has it survived about 5 years of my own clumsiness but this case kept my phone safe from my son actively handling it as well. A piece inside the wallet portion of the case did break off last year but instead of bothering with the lifetime warranty I’ve just been putting it off by having a 4th card instead. Just bought another one for my dad after I upgraded his phone.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This phone case although a little bulky is very useful with the credit card pouch in the back
customer_reviews.text: This phone case although a little bulky is very useful with the credit card pouch in the back. I have an access card to get into work and I keep it in there and just touch my phone to the door panel to get in way more convenient than fumbling through my wallet for the card every day or my pocket. The nice thing is it does not have a slippery grip and I can hold onto it fairly well although it does not feel robbery like some it doesn’t slip out of my hands. I would recommend getting a bright color because I always lose this thing in my car because it blends in with the dark seats.
customer_reviews.author: S. McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case, my old case had a door on the back that slid to give access to the 2 cards it held. The plastic frame for the door broke 3 different times. I figured it was time for a new design. This holds 3 cards securely, and nothing to break.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Almost
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for - something that could hold my driver's license and a credit card so I don't have to carry my wallet with me all the time. From the pictures of the blue color, I was expecting a cobalt blue, but it's more of a dark aqua. Still love it though. Edit: Now that I've had this case for a little over a year, the case has gotten really dirty across the back and I'm not able to wash it off (I tried). I'll be purchasing another one only in black this time. I really do still like it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ewers

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Great phone holder and love that is hides my cards! Have ordered it twice in the past few years. The blue color was looking dirty after a couple years, so I ordered the black one. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Paulding

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case at a great price
customer_reviews.text: for the price I wasn't expected anything so well made. This case has far exceeded my expectations. It does hold three cards and cash and is still pretty slim. I've tried every way to shake out the cards but nothing ever falls out or comes loose. The only way is to purposely take out a card. I just wish I had discovered case sooner. The case is well made and durable with just enough grip.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: My favorite phone case/wallet
customer_reviews.text: I went with the grey case with pineapples because I love "Psych". I stopped carrying a wallet in my back pocket a few years ago. This has been my favorite phone case/wallet so far. I only wish it had a little more room for cards. Three fit perfect. I've been carrying four because I have three credit cards and my license, and I'm worried it's going to stretch it out over time, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for an old Apple phone. And when I got a new old, I went for this brand and this design again as it served me well. I like not having to carry multiple things. I only carry my work id and my transportation pass. The essentials. I recommend this as it is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Papillion7

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: I hate carrying around my wallet and love cases that have wallets attached. I love this case!! This comfortably fits 3 cards (4 but is tight) and so I usually can carry around my license, my work ID, and my credit card so it is always on my personnel. I also love the sleek design because I have had cases that make it obvious that it's carrying cards (which aren't great for safety). However, this blends in so unless you really look, you can't tell I have my personal cards in this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and hard to hold
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this case but this case is awkward to hold. The bulge is weird and I would rather have a flat back or a pocket that isn’t so big. It’s slippery and pretty hard to hold, as well. Also, the plastic isn’t great quality. It just feels super cheap. My cards kept falling out too. I put in 3 each time to prevent them from sliding out but they still did. The little area where you can push out your cards is annoying because sometimes you may accidentally push your cards out Had to return after 3 days of using.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent iPhone case
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to use as his wallet by protecting his phone too. He said it’s excellent. Likes how smooth it is and easy to handle. Works as explained. While not having dropped it (yet) said it feels more durable than his prior case. An added bonus: got a free glass protector (had to enter my email for marketing purposes tho).
customer_reviews.author: Brookshire

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case will protect phone but not enough space for credit cards and Id’s
customer_reviews.text: Overall good phone case. My toddler has dropped my phone several times and it is still working without a scratch. I will say I was a bit disappointed with the lack of card space with this case. I don’t carry a purse most days and like to put my credit cards and id in the pocket but if I put too many I am unable to get them out. The creator would benefit from expanding the pocket a few inches. Great sturdy case overall
customer_reviews.author: Steffane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well-fitted for iPhone SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but lightweight. Stays on securely, yet easy to remove (start at a corner). Openings allow easy access to recharge port, camera, and top volume button. Other covered buttons easy to push. This case solved an unusual problem for me. Holding the bare iPhone to get the SIM card in caused my skin to peel off the areas of hand holding the bare iPhone (think snake-skin-like peeling). Apple said this was probably due to the anti-fingerprint chemical coating. No peeling problem using this case. Thanks, Smartish! Who knew your case could solve a health problem?
customer_reviews.author: rbg

customer_reviews.title: Great Case with Great Features
customer_reviews.text: The qualities of this case are outstanding. I very much enjoy the fact that they involve a screen protector with the order. The case has a nice matte finish-smooth feel to it; it feels nice and comfortable in your hands. Cards fit perfectly and are easy to remove from case for use, but not to easy that it falls out. Security is nice in regards to dropping your phone. I can fit three cards and my drivers license very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Heylin Cardentey

customer_reviews.title: True to Description
customer_reviews.text: Best wallet case that I've used. I've been looking for a good case that protects my phone, doesn't look horrible, and is thin but still works for me and this case met all of those requirements! I got the blue one, it looks exactly like the picture. Even for holding 1 or 5 cards this wallet case works I've dropped it more times than I'd care to count, and it has held us really well. Absolutely love! A really great case, would buy again and do recommend to everybody! Would like it better if we could choose patterns or more styles.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Third one I’ve owned. Great case.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third case from this company and of similar design. I can’t recommend it enough. I no longer carry a wallet (takes some getting used to if you’re used to accessing all your cards or carrying cash) and I get compliments on it all the time. I also use an RFID keycard to access doors at work and I can simply tag my phone next to a kiosk to get in. I love that. I’ve never broken a phone with this case and I’ve dropped it a million times, so all good there. Just buy the dang case. I don’t do a lot of reviews, but I felt like this product deserved my time for a quick comment.
customer_reviews.author: Porcupine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to getting rid of the wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quality phone case that allows me to leave the wallet at home when going out. I usually put my drivers license and 3 credit cards in the case. Unfortunately this case doesn't work with wireless charging but if that is not an issue for you then I would highly recommend this case. Just be warned that if you are forgetful and leave your phone at the bar or in an Uber, you are leaving your phone and your ID and credit cards all at once.
customer_reviews.author: illiniguy

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, sleak and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a month now, and so far I'm really liking it. 3 cards is all I need 90% of the time, so I rarely have to carry a wallet anymore. The case is pretty thin and holds the cards in it fairly well. I have worried that the grip on the cards could worsen with time, making them slide out too easy, but a month in this has not been a problem. I would buy this again and recommend it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: perrbr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just get it and thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I like having my CC easily accessible without having to dig into my purse every time I’m at the register. I’ve had 3 different phone cases with CC holder that flip open and has a mirror. I’ve dropped them so many times and broke all 3. This time I wanted a phone case with wallet that doesn’t flip open. This did the job beautifully! I can fit 2-3 CC and my drivers license. I’ve dropped it many times already and it’s still in tact. No issues cards falling out either. It’s really slim to put in back pocket! I would HIGHLY recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long Story Made Short...It’s Worth It.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case. It’s taken a beating every day since I’ve had it and it’s holding up brand new. It fits 4 cards comfortably and is worth having. It gives me the opportunity to not have to carry around a wallet. People always ask, “What if you lose your phone and you have all your stuff in the case?”. To that I always reply with either, “Well what if you lost your wallet?”, or I just say, “I’ll just do what anyone else would do and get all new cards.”. It’s one of my most practical purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Cothran

customer_reviews.title: I like this.  It holds my cards, they don't slip out, it is exactly what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.text: Because of Covid, I stopped carrying a handbag. I carry my drivers license, medical card, and one credit card. This protective case is perfect for my new normal. I do not miss my handbag either. I wondered if the cards would slip out. They do not. They don't budge until I push them out. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneS

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost 3 months now and I love it. It's got a good grip, but not sticky. Slides into my jeans nicely. I like the matte finish and the cutouts are spot on. There's a nice lip that raises your phone so it doesn't touch the surface when face down. I will say that with the constant removing and putting back of my cards, the wallet clip part has stretched a bit, but it still keeps 3 cards securely.
customer_reviews.author: Charmain

customer_reviews.title: Holds money and cards securely and still easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: Great color price design and delivered quickly! Only had it a couple weeks and haven’t dropped it so i cant comment on how well it protects phone. The buttons work just fine and the cutouts allow for the use of chargers of various sizes. The slot holds several cards securely. I was apprehensive about an open slot but cards and money are held pretty snug. Paper money will stick out unless u fold into thirds. Thats my only gripe
customer_reviews.author: bruntley

customer_reviews.title: Buy this case, you will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Iphone 7 and have owned and used this case now for nearly 6 months. I use the card slot to hold three "rewards" cards that I use regularly - Kroger card, Lowes card, etc. It has worked very well for that purpose since I use Apple Pay everywhere I can and having the rewards cards with the phone has been a game changer. I rarely have to yank out my wallet and dig around for things like I did for years before. The case has held up well and I'm not particularly careful with things. It looks just as good now as it did when new. Buy it, you will NOT regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit my iPhone 7+ perfectly. Good level of protection for the phone and I keep two cards in the back slot. All the phone controls are easy to use/access.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Works very well with pop socket
customer_reviews.text: This case is a great way to store cards as well as have a pop socket if wanted. This case allows a few extra cards to be stored than other cases or card holders that I’ve seen. It’s extremely easy to access the cards
customer_reviews.author: Caelan M.

customer_reviews.title: Lose the purse. Replace it with this case. It’s all I use
customer_reviews.text: Expect this to last a full year. After that my cards would fall out. But a phone gets a lot of wear and tear. This is the case for me. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST case I’ve had in a very long time! Right now I have 4 cards in it and there is room for more. Cash and papers (insurance card) are a bit hard to get in and out but it’s doable. I use a pop socket with it and have not had a problem. It feels good in your hand and had protected my phone from a few falls.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D

customer_reviews.title: Best card case ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this case many times and I LOVE it. You can easily carry 5 cards and don’t have to worry about them slipping out. I drop my phone constantly and I’ve never had an issue with this breaking. I’ve even left it on top of my car and drove off and it still held up!!! Lol. I love the colors (please make more!!!). Way better than folio cases in my opinion. It is a pretty thick case but it works fantastically. I’ve had my newest one for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: annissadalton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy solid case with multiple credit slots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case for a solid protection. The case fits the phone like a glove and give a 3 cc slot in the back. Pretty comfortable in a back pocket (not like a brick). I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case!
customer_reviews.text: This case does just what it's supposed to as far as protecting the phone and holding 3 cards. I ordered the blue case and have had a hard time getting it clean. It's just normal dirt from setting it down. I have tried Windex and rubbing alcohol to clean it and the black won't come off. I'm sure this is the case with any case that isn't black, but it would be nice if it would clean easier. Other than that, it's a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Gail D.

customer_reviews.title: closure clip broke after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: This case was exactly what I needed, but the little piece of plastic that keeps the wallet part closed broke off and the color (red) faded quickly. When the plastic became brittle the piece broke off and now I use tape to keep it closed. Not ideal Also, only holds 2 items (which is as described) but I realize I could use a little more room. Overall, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: Forget speck cases
customer_reviews.text: Forget speck cases! This silk case is the real deal. Softer to touch so not as clunky as other cases yet holds up to drops and doesn’t nit show any signs of abrasions. Owned speck cases for years and after countless ones breaking due to their rigid plastic decided to try fabric, and I’m glad I did. Cheaper price, higher quality. Great case that also can hold more than 2-3 cards in the back, with deeper pockets for the cards to stay secure and not visible when sitting out! A+
customer_reviews.author: Salad

customer_reviews.title: Great phone wallet
customer_reviews.text: My phone is my wallet. I thought I’d hate the bully ness of the design but I find it more secure and easy to use than slide cases. Comfortably holds 3 cards and I can even over stuff it with a couple of $. Makes it a little tight to remove but returns to original form and security after you’ve spent those $$. The matte finish also helps keep it from falling out of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Nice case. Keeps cards and money securely held
customer_reviews.text: Have had this case for two days. Nice case. Keeps cards and money securely held. I had an otter box wallet case prior with my iphone6 and prefer that type of case just because you can't see that I have cards or money in the case. I don't necessarily like having them in display like I feel like this case does. Otherwise, this is a very nice case.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to iPhone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second smartish iPhone case. Got a new bigger phone and got a bigger case. These cases are great. I put my license and a few bucks in it and off I go. Nothing ever falls out. Great addition to phone. Small and compact. Fits easily in pocket. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vensko

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but NOT durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone case for about a couple months now, and while the case itself is convenient with the card holder, it is not a durable or strong case. I dropped my phone -with the case on- and both the front and back of my phone screen shattered. I would recommend looking at another brand, because while this case looks sleek and fits 4 cards, the purpose of a phone case is to protect it- which this doesn't do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: I initially used this product about 6 years ago and love it. Whenever I change phones I find this same case for the new phone. Very convenient for cards, license, etc. Sturdy and slim.
customer_reviews.author: LisaG

customer_reviews.title: So Far Do Good
customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy and I like the convenience and color! My only complaint is that it didn't come with a screen protector which is free but you have to email them separately to get it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy with
customer_reviews.text: This will protect the front screen of your phone since there is a millimeter gap between the face of the phone and the edge of the case. The card holder is stable if there are 3 or more cards. Otherwise, you risk the cards falling out if it's not tight enough. I've had it for a couple of months and the tightness of the card holder haven't loosened yet. I'm sure after a long usage, you will have to add more cards to tighten them up. Overall, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Lam V Doan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional, good looking case
customer_reviews.text: I'm from NY and am used to having my metro card and ID readily available. This holder holds 3-4 cards easily, doesn't "drop" them, and the case has protected my phone on multiple falls. Can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: MariaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Our phones have NEVER broke being dropped in this case (We just like the latest and greatest)
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th case from this brand!! NOT because it breaks.. but because both My husband and I Keep getting new/updated iPhones and we SWEAR BY THIS CASE!! Our phones have NEVER broke being dropped in this case (We just like the latest and greatest), it holds 4 cards securely and comfortably!! PLUS you can slip cash in the back of the case if you tri-fold it!! It's not bulky... perfect shock absorbing texture and great color offerings!! BEST WALLET CASE ON THE MARKET!!
customer_reviews.author: autumn

product_meta.title: Smartish iPhone 7/8/SE (2020) Wallet Case - Wallet Slayer Vol. 1 [Slim + Protective + Grip] Credit Card Holder for Apple iPhone SE 2020 & iPhone 7/8 - [Silk] -Blues on The Green
product_meta.description: Style:iPhone 7 / 8 / SE (2020)| Color:Blues on the GreenDitch the Wallet and go slim with the cool-as-the-other-side-of-the-pillow Wallet Slayer Vol. 1. Your ID, credit cards, and cash all securely fit against your phone-everything you need in one place. But will it protect your phone? That's like asking if tacos are better with salsa. With ultra-light and durable construction it's both thin and protected. Featuring mega-grippy sides and corner air-pockets (think airbags for your iPhone) It truly corners The market on protection, and corny jokes. Get your daily baggage under control and let the Wallet Slayer simplify your life.
feature_bullets: 【Secures 3 cards plus cash】 💲 For the 3 people who still carry cash.
【High-grip textured sides】 ✊ So you DON'T drop it like it's hot
【Ultra-light & durable construction】 💪Thin and protected? It must have a life-coach.
【Protective air-pocket corners】 💨 Think airbags for your iPhone.
【Wireless charging compatible】 🔋 Charges through the case Nikola Tesla Approved!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,831 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Grip, Slim Fit, Heavy Duty Protection, Wallet, Card Holder
specifications.Included Components: Credit Card Wallet, Grippy Sides, Raised Bezel, Card Holder, Screen Protection
